subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd, the 39-year-old veteran, scored 23 points and recorded 8 assists, and J.R. Smith made a difficult jumper as time expired to lift the Knicks over the Suns on Wednesday.
snippet: Jason Kidd, the 39-year-old veteran, scored 23 points and recorded 8 assists, and J.R. Smith made a difficult jumper as time expired to lift the Knicks over the Suns on Wednesday.
